title: How to make $1,000 a month from writing eBooks on Fiverr - Quora

response.answer_text: First, create an account in Fiverr. Then setup your gigs using keywords to rank. Once you have set up your gig, start sending compelling requests using the Buyer's request to bid for jobs. You can also ask your friends to buy your gig and give you 5 star in return. That way, you'll be able to establish credibility on Fiverr and buyers will start contacting to write for them.
